item.description:
I guess we were running out of reasons to party. Well... we found one: Halfway to St. Paddy's Day

The scoop:

Come celebrate the 1/2-way mark of the best holiday of the year and have a chance to win a pair of VIP tickets to U2.

We have teamed up with Tenon Tours, The HARP and Budweiser to bring you the Second biggest party of the year (and a close second at that!). Join 200 of your closest friends as we celebrate St. Paddy’s Day only being 182 days away!

There will only be 200 admitted to the exclusive Pre-Party. Boston’s very own Curragh’s Fancy will be playing your favorite Irish drinking songs while you enjoy free St. Patty’s Day appetizers and a complimentary cocktail. At 9:30 pm there will be a drawing for a 2 free flights to Ireland. There will also be prizes for best dressed!
At 9:30, the upstairs will open and Boston’s premiere U2 Tribute Band, Joshua Tree, will go on stage. The downstairs will remain open where DJ Vince1 will be spinning the perfect mix of Hip-Hop, Top 40, Mash-ups and 80s.

Around Midnight, there will be a drawing for 2 sets of tickets to see U2 Perform at Gillette Stadium, complete with Limo Service!


Event Times:
7:00pm – 9:30pm: Doors open, Exclusive VIP Pre-Party
9:30pm – 1:30am: Entire Harp Opens – 2 Levels of Entertainment

Includes:

No cover charge
Free appetizers between 7-9:30
One free beer or cocktail
Free shamrock beads and stupid hats
Traditional Irish Music by Curragh’s Fancy (7-9pm downstairs)
Live Performance by The Joshua Tree, Boston’s own U2 Tribute Band (10pm-1am upstairs)
DJ Vince 1 spinning the best mash-ups, house, and pop (10pm-1am downstairs)
A chance to win a VIP package to U2, complete with a pair of tickets and limo service
A chance to win other great prizes including a Free Flight to Ireland


Suggested Attire: Dress to Impress

Directions: Paste in your browser for directions:
http://maps.google.co...

Cost: $40.00
If purchased by 9/11/09
item.name: Halfway to St. Paddy's Day!
